message: Let's start with a fair split. Accept and we can end the game.
You're starting high, I'm starting low. Your turn to blink!
Meet me in the middle. No need to be greedy.
You're still being too even-handed. I want more!
You're getting greedy, but I'm willing to meet you halfway.
You're getting closer, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'm not backing down. You'll have to do better than that.
You're pushing your luck, but I'll give you one last chance.
Last chance, Bob. Take it or leave it.
You're really lowballing me now. I'm not going to take it.
You're not going to get a better deal than this. Take it or walk away.
I'm not going to let you walk all over me. I'll take control now.
This is my last stand. You're getting the short end of the stick.
I'm not afraid of the short end. Bring it on!
This is my last resort. You're getting the bare minimum.
I'm not settling for crumbs. I want a fair share.
This is my final offer. Take it or leave it, I don't care.
You're really trying to steal from me? Not on my watch!
I'm not going to give you anything. You're getting nothing.
You're not getting away with this. I want something, anything!
Fine, take it all. I'm done.
